room_title: Escape room "Abigail's Playroom" by The Escape Plan in New Brunswick
review: We loved it! Abigail's Playroom was themed brilliantly, with creative clues and puzzles. The room was fun, and even a little bit personalized! The staff was very friendly. My family is excited to return to escape The Estate!

room_title: Escape room "Abigail's Playroom" by The Escape Plan in New Brunswick
review: We loved it! We went last night to the Abigail's room, made it out in 45 mins and 11 seconds. The staff were very friendly. Can't wait to go in the other room. Will recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Abigail's Playroom" by The Escape Plan in New Brunswick
review: Did Abigail's Playroom... Amazing! Awesome thought went into the designs/plot. Friendly staff. Looking forward to doing the other room (The Estate).
